oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-11-01 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 1, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hawkshaw Hawkins (host/performer), guest performers Johnnie & Jack, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 995th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Johnnie & Jack; Grandpa Jones; Hawkshaw Hawkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) [continued from part 1] -- Prince Albert commercial (Minnie Pearl, Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Johnnie & Jack -- Stop The World (And Let Me Off) (Johnnie & Jack) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Grandpa Jones -- Eight More Miles To Louisville (Grandpa Jones) -- Grant Turner and Hawkshaw Hawkins announce his tour schedule -- Freedom (Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Hawkins, Hawkshaw, 1921-1963; Johnnie & Jack; Wright, Johnnie, 1914-2011; Anglin, Jack, 1916-1963
